DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Face Paint - Grass Green (75 ml)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Grass Green Face Paint applies smoothly, can be easily blended and will dry in about 30 seconds to a streak-free, durable finish. Snazaroo Classic Face Paints are Snazaroo's traditional colors.
Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and wash off easily.
Snazaroo Grass Green Face Paint gives brightly colored, totally opaque coverage and comes in a 2.54 ounces (75 ml) size container.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 2.54 ounces (75 ml) Snazaroo Face Paint Container is good for 400 full faces or 2,000 cheek art designs (approx. 2in x 2in size).
Tons of colors to choose from
One of the most popular face paints in the world
